links.title: Pedone: Twitter Inc (TWTR), Alibaba Group Holding Ltd (BABA) Are 'Solid' Setups
links.description: Technical analyst and independent trader Roberto Pedone recently mentioned a few stocks he is watching. Pedone thinks Twitter Inc (NYSE: TWTR) is "overdone to the downside and setting up to bounce soon." He says the MACD looks ready to activate a bullish crossover and the stock had "a solid volume day off a PR detailing their partnership with Google in regards to search."
